name: Hero
headline: Bill.com for Latam
description: SMBs in Latam use our WhatsApp bot and corporate cards to organize their expenses

founders.name: Fernando Varela, Founder
founders.description:
Ex quant. I like gaming, math puzzles and cooking. Specially cooking, food in general. 

I mostly experiment on using low lactose alternatives (like goat cheese) to make lactose heavy meals (like cacio e pepe).

## Diseñado para manejar los gastos de tu compañía
![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/bocao1-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/feduro-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/capricho1-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/celmar1-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/celtec1-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/centralam1-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/cookingmamma1-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/derpet1-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/evb1-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/flyingpumas1-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/gruporesidencial1-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/gut1-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/gva1-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/healtheat1-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/ignis1-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/invernadero1-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/iterum1-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/kalabaza1-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/lovill1-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/vertical1-200h.png)
## Nuestros servicios
200+Compañías organizan sus finanzas con Hero
$65,000,000+En gastos registrados en Hero
$1,600,000+Pagados con tarjetas de Hero
## Tecnología de Contabilidad
El software que necesitas para tener la contabilidad de tu negocio en orden y al día.
![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/bocao1-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/capricho1-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/cookingmamma1-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/accounting_client_logo_11-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/flyingpumas1-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/accounting_client_logo_54-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/gut1-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/invernadero1-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/accounting_client_logo_10-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/kalabaza1-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/accounting_client_logo_53-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/accounting_client_logo_55-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/accounting_client_logo_9-200h.png)
# Hero te da
## Reportes Financieros
Balance y Estado de Resultados al día. Todos los meses.En la plataforma de Hero puedes investigar cada movimiento.
## Atención CPA
CPA que trabajan con Hero resuelven todas tus dudas de la contabilidad de tu negocio.
## Planilla
Cálculos, liquidaciones, SIPE, Planilla 03Con comprobantes para empleados y desglose de todos los cálculos.
![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/lp%20\(1\)1-1400w.png)
![feature 1](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/background_inteligencia-1400w.jpeg)
# Cómo lo hacemos?Automatizaciones
Hero sealimenta automáticamentede las siguientes fuentes para armar tu contabilidad.
## Banco
Todas tus transacciones de Banco General, BAC, y otros bancos en Panamá.
## Tarjetas
Todas las transacciones de tus tarjetas de Hero (👑), Banco General, BAC, y otros bancos en Panamá.
## POS
Todas las transacciones de Invu y puntos de venta de Banco General, BAC, y otros.
![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/dall%C3%A2%C2%B7e%202024-04-17%2015.33.18%20-%20a%20modern%20and%20sleek%20office%20environment%20featuring%20a%20group%20of%20diverse%20professionals%20gathered%20around%20a%20conference%20table%2C%20actively%20engaged%20in%20work.%20the%20off-400h.webp)
Para compañías con
# Contabilidad interna
  * Tarjetas de débito Mastercard
  * Reportes y aprobaciones de gastos
  * Integraciones con sistemas contables
  * Mucho más


[Cómo funciona?](https://www.herofacturas.com/</manejodegastos>)
![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/dall%C3%A2%C2%B7e%202024-04-17%2016.38.05%20-%20a%20more%20realistic%20setting%20for%20companies%20with%20outsourced%20accounting%2C%20depicting%20a%20group%20of%20younger%2C%20diverse%20professionals%20such%20as%20restaurant%20owners%2C%20entr-400h.webp)
Para compañías que buscan
# Contabilidad tercerizada
  * Tarjetas de débito Mastercard
  * Integraciones, Reportes Financieros en tiempo real, planilla
  * Equipo CPA a su disposición
  * Cumplimiento de obligaciones de sociedad


[Cómo funciona?](https://www.herofacturas.com/</contabilidad>)
## Bot de WhatsApp
Fácil de usarSolo envía un archivo de una factura (foto, captura de pantalla, PDF), y escribe una descripción
Inteligencia artificialHero extrae los datos de la factura automáticamente con inteligencia artificial
[Ver más sobre bot de WhatsApp ->](https://www.herofacturas.com/</bot>)
## Tarjetas corporativas
Se integran con bot de WhatsApp y página web
Mastercard Business de débito
Obtenla sin papeleo en 1 día
Gratis para usuarios de Hero
[Ver más sobre tarjetas ->](https://www.herofacturas.com/</tarjetas>)
![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/cards_transparent-600h.png)
![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/screen%20shot%202023-01-24%20at%2010.54.38%20am1-400h.png)
## Página web
Administra tus gastosRevisa, edita, estudia todos tus gastos y los de tu equipo
ReportesMira tus estados financieros. Crea y comparte reportes de gastos
VisualizacionesMira gráficas por categoría y tiempo de todos tus gastos y ventas
[Ver más sobre página web ->](https://www.herofacturas.com/</plataforma>)
# Plataforma de Manejo de Gastos
Para compañías que tienen colaboradores creandoreportes de gastos y pasándolos aldepartamento de contabilidadAhorrarán tiempo y dinero
![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/feduro-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/celmar1-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/celtec1-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/vitae-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/centralam1-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/derpet1-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/flyingpumas1-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/gruporesidencial1-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/gva1-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/healtheat1-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/ignis1-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/iterum1-200h.png)![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/logos/vertical1-200h.png)
![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/cards_transparent-600h.png)
# Tarjetas Mastercard
Gasta con control[Ver Tarjetas](https://www.herofacturas.com/</tarjetas>)
![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/bot%20still%20card%20transaction%202024-200w.png)
# Bot de WhatsApp
Captura información[Ver Bot](https://www.herofacturas.com/</tarjetas>)
![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/cards_limites_mockup-200h.png)
# Reportes de gastos
Aprueba digitalmente[Ver Plataforma](https://www.herofacturas.com/</plataforma>)
![image](https://www.herofacturas.com/Hero assets/sage_logo-200h.png)
# Contabilidad
Carga automáticamente[Conversar sobre integraciones](https://www.herofacturas.com/<https:/calendly.com/hero-facturas/30min>)
Hablemos si tienes dudas de Hero[Agendar demo](https://www.herofacturas.com/<https:/calendly.com/hero-facturas/30min>)

generated_description:
### Company Overview: Hero Facturas

**Website:** [Hero Facturas](https://www.herofacturas.com/)  
**Founded:** 2021  
**Location:** Panama City, Panama  
**Team Size:** 5 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** S22  
**Group Partner:** Dalton Caldwell  

---

#### Mission
Hero aims to provide a financial management solution akin to Bill.com specifically tailored for small-to-medium-sized businesses (SMBs) in Latin America. 

#### How They Operate  
Hero started by offering a WhatsApp bot and corporate cards that help SMBs organize and manage their expenses efficiently. This combination not only simplifies expense tracking but also integrates seamlessly into existing financial workflows.

#### Key Offerings
1. **WhatsApp Bot:** A user-friendly bot that allows businesses to send invoices via file uploads (such as photos or PDFs) and receive instant data extraction powered by AI.
2. **Mastercard Corporate Cards:** Easy access to corporate debit cards that allow companies to control their expenses directly from the platform.
3. **Accounting Platform:** An intuitive interface where businesses can manage their expenses, view financial reports, and maintain a clear overview of their financial health.

#### Statistics
- **200+ Companies** use Hero for their financial management.
- **$65 million+** in expenses have been recorded through the platform.
- **$1.6 million+** spent using Hero’s Mastercard cards.

---

#### Features
- **Automated Accounting:** Hero pulls transactions from local banks and Point of Sale (POS) systems, streamlining the accounting process.
- **Real-time Financial Reports:** Provides monthly balance sheets and income statements to keep businesses informed.
- **CPA Support:** Access to certified public accountants helps address any business-owner queries about accounting concerns.
- **Payroll Management:** Helps with calculations, liquidations, and employee payments.

#### Use Cases
Hero is built for:
- Companies with internal accounting teams needing expense tracking and reporting capabilities.
- Businesses seeking outsourced accounting solutions with additional support and compliance assistance.

---

#### Conclusion
Hero is positioning itself as a comprehensive financial solution for SMBs in Latin America, marrying technology with traditional accounting services. So, if you're looking to simplify your company’s expense management and keep your accounting in check, you might want to give Hero a look. It's fintech designed for the unique challenges of businesses in LATAM.
